mapper.select: select u.* from sysuser u,company c where u.companyId=c.id and u.loginName =#{loginName} and u.loginPwd=#{loginPwd} and c.companyName =#{companyName}
select * from sysuser where loginName =#{loginName} and loginPwd =#{loginPwd}
select * from sysuser where userType=2 and companyId =#{companyId}
select ifnull(max(cardNO),0)+1 cardNO from sysUser where companyId=#{companyId}
select count(id) from sysUser where companyId=#{companyId} and cardSN=#{cardSN}
mapper.update: update sysUser set status=#{status} where operId=#{operId}
